name: Lost In Trainstation (Ionatan B Maghidman, NathanLeafe, Irregularbanana, TortueInteractive, Yiyi HE)
name_original: Lost In Trainstation (Ionatan B Maghidman, NathanLeafe, Irregularbanana, TortueInteractive, Yiyi HE)
description:
You receive a post card from your Aunt to meet up for a picnic.

She lives in a far away land, where the language is incomprehensible to you.

You must take the right train in order to meet up with her.
